A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Poor writing. Poor villains. No character motivations. Long useless subplots. Oh and the main character is invincible. This movie goes from cool\, to oh wow interesting\, to wow no pay off\, and lol that's cheesy and SOOO predictable. Finally it's over. Movie tries to be political..

Another review talks about how LJ is similar to The Walking Dead.. yep.. twists for the sake of twists- not doing anything for the story. 

Can't believe this has a 93% on RT - I think they'll just give any disney movie a high score.
